ä¸€ä¸ªç¤ºä¾‹å›é¡¾ Future

åœ¨ä¸€äº›ä¸šåŠ¡åœºæ™¯æˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨å¤šçº¿ç¨‹å¼‚æ­¥æ‰§è¡Œä»»åŠ¡ï¼ŒåŠ å¿«ä»»åŠ¡æ‰§è¡Œé€Ÿåº¦ã€‚

JDK5 æ–°å¢äº†Futureæ¥å£ï¼Œç”¨äºæè¿°ä¸€ä¸ªå¼‚æ­¥è®¡ç®—çš„ç»“æœã€‚

è™½ç„¶ Future ä»¥åŠç›¸å…³ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹æ³•æä¾›äº†å¼‚æ­¥æ‰§è¡Œä»»åŠ¡çš„èƒ½åŠ›ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å¯¹äºç»“æœçš„è·å–å´æ˜¯å¾ˆä¸æ–¹ä¾¿ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¿…é¡»ä½¿ç”¨Future.get()çš„æ–¹å¼é˜»å¡è°ƒç”¨çº¿ç¨‹ï¼Œæˆ–è€…ä½¿ç”¨è½®è¯¢æ–¹å¼åˆ¤æ–­ Future.isDone ä»»åŠ¡æ˜¯å¦ç»“æŸï¼Œå†è·å–ç»“æœã€‚

è¿™ä¸¤ç§å¤„ç†æ–¹å¼éƒ½ä¸æ˜¯å¾ˆä¼˜é›…ï¼Œç›¸å…³ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹:

@Test
public void testFuture() throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException {
    ExecutorService executorService = Executors.newFixedThreadPool(5);
    Future<String> future = executorService.submit(() -> {
        Thread.sleep(2000);
        return "hello";
    });
    System.out.println(future.get());
    System.out.println("end");
}

ä¸æ­¤åŒæ—¶ï¼ŒFuture æ— æ³•è§£å†³å¤šä¸ªå¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡ç›¸äº’ä¾èµ–çš„åœºæ™¯ï¼Œç®€å•ç‚¹è¯´å°±æ˜¯ï¼Œä¸»çº¿ç¨‹éœ€è¦ç­‰å¾…å­çº¿ç¨‹ä»»åŠ¡æ‰§è¡Œå®Œæ¯•ä¹‹ååœ¨è¿›è¡Œæ‰§è¡Œï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªæ—¶å€™ä½ å¯èƒ½æƒ³åˆ°äº† ã€ŒCountDownLatchã€ï¼Œæ²¡é”™ç¡®å®å¯ä»¥è§£å†³ï¼Œä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ã€‚

è¿™é‡Œå®šä¹‰ä¸¤ä¸ª Futureï¼Œç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªé€šè¿‡ç”¨æˆ· id è·å–ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œç¬¬äºŒä¸ªé€šè¿‡å•†å“ id è·å–å•†å“ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚

Â @Test
public void testCountDownLatch() throws InterruptedException, ExecutionException {
    ExecutorService executorService = Executors.newFixedThreadPool(5);

    CountDownLatch downLatch = new CountDownLatch(2);

    long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
    Future<String> userFuture = executorService.submit(() -> {
        //æ¨¡æ‹ŸæŸ¥è¯¢å•†å“è€—æ—¶500æ¯«ç§’
        Thread.sleep(500);
        downLatch.countDown();
        return "ç”¨æˆ·A";
    });

    Future<String> goodsFuture = executorService.submit(() -> {
        //æ¨¡æ‹ŸæŸ¥è¯¢å•†å“è€—æ—¶500æ¯«ç§’
        Thread.sleep(400);
        downLatch.countDown();
        return "å•†å“A";
    });

    downLatch.await();
    //æ¨¡æ‹Ÿä¸»ç¨‹åºè€—æ—¶æ—¶é—´
    Thread.sleep(600);
    System.out.println("è·å–ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯:" + userFuture.get());
    System.out.println("è·å–å•†å“ä¿¡æ¯:" + goodsFuture.get());
    System.out.println("æ€»å…±ç”¨æ—¶" + (System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime) + "ms");

}

ã€Œè¿è¡Œç»“æœã€

è·å–ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯:ç”¨æˆ·A
è·å–å•†å“ä¿¡æ¯:å•†å“A
æ€»å…±ç”¨æ—¶1110ms

ä»è¿è¡Œç»“æœå¯ä»¥çœ‹å‡ºç»“æœéƒ½å·²ç»è·å–ï¼Œè€Œä¸”å¦‚æœæˆ‘ä»¬ä¸ç”¨å¼‚æ­¥æ“ä½œï¼Œæ‰§è¡Œæ—¶é—´åº”è¯¥æ˜¯ï¼š500+400+600 = 1500,ç”¨å¼‚æ­¥æ“ä½œåå®é™…åªç”¨ 1110ã€‚

ä½†æ˜¯ Java8 ä»¥åæˆ‘ä¸å†è®¤ä¸ºè¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ç§ä¼˜é›…çš„è§£å†³æ–¹å¼ï¼Œæ¥ä¸‹æ¥æ¥äº†è§£ä¸‹ CompletableFuture çš„ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚

é€šè¿‡ CompletableFuture å®ç°ä¸Šé¢ç¤ºä¾‹

@Test
public void testCompletableInfo() throws InterruptedException, ExecutionException {
    long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();

    //è°ƒç”¨ç”¨æˆ·æœåŠ¡è·å–ç”¨æˆ·åŸºæœ¬ä¿¡æ¯
    CompletableFuture<String> userFuture = CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(() ->
            //æ¨¡æ‹ŸæŸ¥è¯¢å•†å“è€—æ—¶500æ¯«ç§’
    {
        try {
            Thread.sleep(500);
        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
        return "ç”¨æˆ·A";
    });

    //è°ƒç”¨å•†å“æœåŠ¡è·å–å•†å“åŸºæœ¬ä¿¡æ¯
    CompletableFuture<String> goodsFuture = CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(() ->
            //æ¨¡æ‹ŸæŸ¥è¯¢å•†å“è€—æ—¶500æ¯«ç§’
    {
        try {
            Thread.sleep(400);
        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
        return "å•†å“A";
    });

    System.out.println("è·å–ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯:" + userFuture.get());
    System.out.println("è·å–å•†å“ä¿¡æ¯:" + goodsFuture.get());

    //æ¨¡æ‹Ÿä¸»ç¨‹åºè€—æ—¶æ—¶é—´
    Thread.sleep(600);
    System.out.println("æ€»å…±ç”¨æ—¶" + (System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime) + "ms");
}

è¿è¡Œç»“æœ

è·å–ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯:ç”¨æˆ·A
è·å–å•†å“ä¿¡æ¯:å•†å“A
æ€»å…±ç”¨æ—¶1112ms

é€šè¿‡ CompletableFuture å¯ä»¥å¾ˆè½»æ¾çš„å®ç° CountDownLatch çš„åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œä½ ä»¥ä¸ºè¿™å°±ç»“æŸäº†ï¼Œè¿œè¿œä¸æ­¢ï¼ŒCompletableFuture æ¯”è¿™è¦å¼ºå¤šäº†ã€‚

æ¯”å¦‚å¯ä»¥å®ç°:ä»»åŠ¡ 1 æ‰§è¡Œå®Œäº†å†æ‰§è¡Œä»»åŠ¡ 2,ç”šè‡³ä»»åŠ¡ 1 æ‰§è¡Œçš„ç»“æœï¼Œä½œä¸ºä»»åŠ¡ 2 çš„å…¥å‚æ•°ç­‰ç­‰å¼ºå¤§åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œä¸‹é¢å°±æ¥å­¦å­¦ CompletableFuture çš„ APIã€‚

CompletableFuture åˆ›å»ºæ–¹å¼

1ã€å¸¸ç”¨çš„ 4 ç§åˆ›å»ºæ–¹å¼

CompletableFuture æºç ä¸­æœ‰å››ä¸ªé™æ€æ–¹æ³•ç”¨æ¥æ‰§è¡Œå¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡

publicÂ staticÂ <U>Â CompletableFuture<U>Â supplyAsync(Supplier<U>Â supplier){..}
publicÂ staticÂ <U>Â CompletableFuture<U>Â supplyAsync(Supplier<U>Â supplier,ExecutorÂ executor){..}
publicÂ staticÂ CompletableFuture<Void>Â runAsync(RunnableÂ runnable){..}
publicÂ staticÂ CompletableFuture<Void>Â runAsync(RunnableÂ runnable,ExecutorÂ executor){..}

ä¸€èˆ¬æˆ‘ä»¬ç”¨ä¸Šé¢çš„é™æ€æ–¹æ³•æ¥åˆ›å»º CompletableFutureï¼Œè¿™é‡Œä¹Ÿè§£é‡Šä¸‹ä»–ä»¬çš„åŒºåˆ«:

  • **ã€ŒsupplyAsyncã€**æ‰§è¡Œä»»åŠ¡ï¼Œæ”¯æŒè¿”å›å€¼ã€‚
  • **ã€ŒrunAsyncã€**æ‰§è¡Œä»»åŠ¡ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰è¿”å›å€¼ã€‚

â‘ ã€ã€ŒsupplyAsync æ–¹æ³•ã€

//ä½¿ç”¨é»˜è®¤å†…ç½®çº¿ç¨‹æ± ForkJoinPool.commonPool()ï¼Œæ ¹æ®supplieræ„å»ºæ‰§è¡Œä»»åŠ¡

â‘¡ã€ã€ŒrunAsync æ–¹æ³•ã€

2ã€ç»“æœè·å–çš„ 4 ç§æ–¹å¼

è¯´æ˜ï¼š

  • ã€Œget()å’Œ get(long timeout, TimeUnit unit)ã€ => åœ¨ Future ä¸­å°±å·²ç»æä¾›äº†ï¼Œåè€…æä¾›è¶…æ—¶å¤„ç†ï¼Œå¦‚æœåœ¨æŒ‡å®šæ—¶é—´å†…æœªè·å–ç»“æœå°†æŠ›å‡ºè¶…æ—¶å¼‚å¸¸
  • ã€ŒgetNowã€ => ç«‹å³è·å–ç»“æœä¸é˜»å¡ï¼Œç»“æœè®¡ç®—å·²å®Œæˆå°†è¿”å›ç»“æœæˆ–è®¡ç®—è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­çš„å¼‚å¸¸ï¼Œå¦‚æœæœªè®¡ç®—å®Œæˆå°†è¿”å›è®¾å®šçš„ valueIfAbsent å€¼
  • ã€Œjoinã€ => æ–¹æ³•é‡Œä¸ä¼šæŠ›å‡ºå¼‚å¸¸

ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼š

@Test
public void testCompletableGet() throws InterruptedException, ExecutionException {

  CompletableFuture<String> cp1 = CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(() -> {
      try {
          Thread.sleep(1000);
      } catch (InterruptedException e) {
          e.printStackTrace();
      }
      return "å•†å“A";
  });

  // getNowæ–¹æ³•æµ‹è¯• 
  System.out.println(cp1.getNow("å•†å“B"));

  //joinæ–¹æ³•æµ‹è¯• 
  CompletableFuture<Integer> cp2 = CompletableFuture.supplyAsync((() -> 1 / 0));
  System.out.println(cp2.join());
  System.out.println("-----------------------------------------------------");
  //getæ–¹æ³•æµ‹è¯•
  CompletableFuture<Integer> cp3 = CompletableFuture.supplyAsync((() -> 1 / 0));
  System.out.println(cp3.get());
}

ã€Œè¿è¡Œç»“æœã€ï¼š

  • ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ‰§è¡Œç»“æœä¸º ã€Œå•†å“ Bã€ï¼Œå› ä¸ºè¦å…ˆç¡ä¸Š 1 ç§’ç»“æœä¸èƒ½ç«‹å³è·å–
  • join æ–¹æ³•è·å–ç»“æœæ–¹æ³•é‡Œä¸ä¼šæŠ›å¼‚å¸¸ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æ‰§è¡Œç»“æœä¼šæŠ›å¼‚å¸¸ï¼ŒæŠ›å‡ºçš„å¼‚å¸¸ä¸º CompletionException
  • get æ–¹æ³•è·å–ç»“æœæ–¹æ³•é‡Œå°†æŠ›å‡ºå¼‚å¸¸ï¼Œæ‰§è¡Œç»“æœæŠ›å‡ºçš„å¼‚å¸¸ä¸º ExecutionException

å¼‚æ­¥å›è°ƒæ–¹æ³•

1ã€thenRun/thenRunAsync

é€šä¿—ç‚¹è®²å°±æ˜¯ï¼Œã€Œåšå®Œç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡åï¼Œå†åšç¬¬äºŒä¸ªä»»åŠ¡,ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªä»»åŠ¡ä¹Ÿæ²¡æœ‰è¿”å›å€¼ã€ã€‚

ç¤ºä¾‹

@Test
public void testCompletableThenRunAsync() throws InterruptedException, ExecutionException {
    long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
    
    CompletableFuture<Void> cp1 = CompletableFuture.runAsync(() -> {
        try {
            //æ‰§è¡Œä»»åŠ¡A
            Thread.sleep(600);
        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }

    });

    CompletableFuture<Void> cp2 =  cp1.thenRun(() -> {
        try {
            //æ‰§è¡Œä»»åŠ¡B
            Thread.sleep(400);
        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    });

    // getæ–¹æ³•æµ‹è¯•
    System.out.println(cp2.get());

    //æ¨¡æ‹Ÿä¸»ç¨‹åºè€—æ—¶æ—¶é—´
    Thread.sleep(600);
    System.out.println("æ€»å…±ç”¨æ—¶" + (System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime) + "ms");
}
  
//è¿è¡Œç»“æœ  
/**

*  null

*  æ€»å…±ç”¨æ—¶1610ms

*/

ã€ŒthenRun å’Œ thenRunAsync æœ‰ä»€ä¹ˆåŒºåˆ«å‘¢ï¼Ÿã€

å¦‚æœä½ æ‰§è¡Œç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œä¼ å…¥äº†ä¸€ä¸ªè‡ªå®šä¹‰çº¿ç¨‹æ± ï¼š

  • è°ƒç”¨ thenRun æ–¹æ³•æ‰§è¡Œç¬¬äºŒä¸ªä»»åŠ¡æ—¶ï¼Œåˆ™ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªä»»åŠ¡å’Œç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡æ˜¯å…±ç”¨åŒä¸€ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹æ± ã€‚
  • è°ƒç”¨ thenRunAsync æ‰§è¡Œç¬¬äºŒä¸ªä»»åŠ¡æ—¶ï¼Œåˆ™ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ˜¯ä½ è‡ªå·±ä¼ å…¥çš„çº¿ç¨‹æ± ï¼Œç¬¬äºŒä¸ªä»»åŠ¡ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ˜¯ ForkJoin çº¿ç¨‹æ± ã€‚

è¯´æ˜: åé¢ä»‹ç»çš„ thenAccept å’Œ thenAcceptAsyncï¼ŒthenApply å’Œ thenApplyAsync ç­‰ï¼Œå®ƒä»¬ä¹‹é—´çš„åŒºåˆ«ä¹Ÿæ˜¯è¿™ä¸ªã€‚

2ã€thenAccept/thenAcceptAsync

ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡æ‰§è¡Œå®Œæˆåï¼Œæ‰§è¡Œç¬¬äºŒä¸ªå›è°ƒæ–¹æ³•ä»»åŠ¡ï¼Œä¼šå°†è¯¥ä»»åŠ¡çš„æ‰§è¡Œç»“æœï¼Œä½œä¸ºå…¥å‚ï¼Œä¼ é€’åˆ°å›è°ƒæ–¹æ³•ä¸­ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å›è°ƒæ–¹æ³•æ˜¯æ²¡æœ‰è¿”å›å€¼çš„ã€‚

ç¤ºä¾‹

@Test
public void testCompletableThenAccept() throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException {
    long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
    CompletableFuture<String> cp1 = CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(() -> {
        return "dev";

    });
    CompletableFuture<Void> cp2 =  cp1.thenAccept((a) -> {
        System.out.println("ä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡çš„è¿”å›ç»“æœä¸º: " + a);
    });

    cp2.get();
}

3ã€ thenApply/thenApplyAsync

è¡¨ç¤ºç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡æ‰§è¡Œå®Œæˆåï¼Œæ‰§è¡Œç¬¬äºŒä¸ªå›è°ƒæ–¹æ³•ä»»åŠ¡ï¼Œä¼šå°†è¯¥ä»»åŠ¡çš„æ‰§è¡Œç»“æœï¼Œä½œä¸ºå…¥å‚ï¼Œä¼ é€’åˆ°å›è°ƒæ–¹æ³•ä¸­ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”å›è°ƒæ–¹æ³•æ˜¯æœ‰è¿”å›å€¼çš„ã€‚

@Test
public void testCompletableThenApply() throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException {
    CompletableFuture<String> cp1 = CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(() -> {
        return "dev";

    }).thenApply((a) -> {
        if(Objects.equals(a,"dev")){
            return "dev";
        }
        return "prod";
    });

    System.out.println("å½“å‰ç¯å¢ƒä¸º:" + cp1.get());

    //è¾“å‡º: å½“å‰ç¯å¢ƒä¸º:dev
}

å¼‚å¸¸å›è°ƒ

CompletableFuture ä»»åŠ¡ä¸è®ºæ˜¯æ­£å¸¸å®Œæˆè¿˜æ˜¯å‡ºç°å¼‚å¸¸ï¼Œéƒ½ä¼šè°ƒç”¨ ã€ŒwhenCompleteã€ è¿™ä¸ªå›è°ƒå‡½æ•°ã€‚

  • ã€Œæ­£å¸¸å®Œæˆã€ï¼šwhenComplete è¿”å›ç»“æœå’Œä¸Šçº§ä»»åŠ¡ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œå¼‚å¸¸ä¸º nullï¼›
  • ã€Œå‡ºç°å¼‚å¸¸ã€ï¼šwhenComplete è¿”å›ç»“æœä¸º nullï¼Œå¼‚å¸¸ä¸ºä¸Šçº§ä»»åŠ¡çš„å¼‚å¸¸ï¼›

å³è°ƒç”¨ get()æ—¶ï¼Œæ­£å¸¸å®Œæˆæ—¶å°±è·å–åˆ°ç»“æœï¼Œå‡ºç°å¼‚å¸¸æ—¶å°±ä¼šæŠ›å‡ºå¼‚å¸¸ï¼Œéœ€è¦ä½ å¤„ç†è¯¥å¼‚å¸¸ã€‚

1ã€åªç”¨ whenComplete

@Test
public void testCompletableWhenComplete() throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException {
    CompletableFuture<Double> future = CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(() -> {

        if (Math.random() < 0.5) {
            throw new RuntimeException("å‡ºé”™äº†");
        }
        System.out.println("æ­£å¸¸ç»“æŸ");
        return 0.11;

    }).whenComplete((aDouble, throwable) -> {
        if (aDouble == null) {
            System.out.println("whenComplete aDouble is null");
        } else {
            System.out.println("whenComplete aDouble is " + aDouble);
        }
        if (throwable == null) {
            System.out.println("whenComplete throwable is null");
        } else {
            System.out.println("whenComplete throwable is " + throwable.getMessage());
        }
    });
    System.out.println("æœ€ç»ˆè¿”å›çš„ç»“æœ = " + future.get());
}

æ­£å¸¸å®Œæˆï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰å¼‚å¸¸æ—¶ï¼š

æ­£å¸¸ç»“æŸ
whenCompleteÂ aDoubleÂ isÂ 0.11
whenCompleteÂ throwableÂ isÂ null
æœ€ç»ˆè¿”å›çš„ç»“æœÂ =Â 0.11

å‡ºç°å¼‚å¸¸æ—¶ï¼šget()ä¼šæŠ›å‡ºå¼‚å¸¸

whenCompleteÂ aDoubleÂ isÂ null
whenCompleteÂ throwableÂ isÂ java.lang.RuntimeException:Â å‡ºé”™äº†

java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException:Â java.lang.RuntimeException:Â å‡ºé”™äº†
Â atÂ java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.reportGet(CompletableFuture.java:357)
Â atÂ java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.get(CompletableFuture.java:1895)

2ã€whenComplete + exceptionally ç¤ºä¾‹

Â @Test
public void testWhenCompleteExceptionally() throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException {
    CompletableFuture<Double> future = CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(() -> {
        if (Math.random() < 0.5) {
            throw new RuntimeException("å‡ºé”™äº†");
        }
        System.out.println("æ­£å¸¸ç»“æŸ");
        return 0.11;

    }).whenComplete((aDouble, throwable) -> {
        if (aDouble == null) {
            System.out.println("whenComplete aDouble is null");
        } else {
            System.out.println("whenComplete aDouble is " + aDouble);
        }
        if (throwable == null) {
            System.out.println("whenComplete throwable is null");
        } else {
            System.out.println("whenComplete throwable is " + throwable.getMessage());
        }
    }).exceptionally((throwable) -> {
        System.out.println("exceptionallyä¸­å¼‚å¸¸ï¼š" + throwable.getMessage());
        return 0.0;
    });

    System.out.println("æœ€ç»ˆè¿”å›çš„ç»“æœ = " + future.get());
}

å½“å‡ºç°å¼‚å¸¸æ—¶ï¼Œexceptionally ä¸­ä¼šæ•è·è¯¥å¼‚å¸¸ï¼Œç»™å‡ºé»˜è®¤è¿”å›å€¼ 0.0ã€‚

1ã€AND ç»„åˆå…³ç³»

thenCombine / thenAcceptBoth / runAfterBoth éƒ½è¡¨ç¤ºï¼šã€Œå½“ä»»åŠ¡ä¸€å’Œä»»åŠ¡äºŒéƒ½å®Œæˆå†æ‰§è¡Œä»»åŠ¡ä¸‰ã€ã€‚

åŒºåˆ«åœ¨äºï¼š

  • ã€ŒrunAfterBothã€ ä¸ä¼šæŠŠæ‰§è¡Œç»“æœå½“åšæ–¹æ³•å…¥å‚ï¼Œä¸”æ²¡æœ‰è¿”å›å€¼
  • ã€ŒthenAcceptBothã€: ä¼šå°†ä¸¤ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡çš„æ‰§è¡Œç»“æœä½œä¸ºæ–¹æ³•å…¥å‚ï¼Œä¼ é€’åˆ°æŒ‡å®šæ–¹æ³•ä¸­ï¼Œä¸”æ— è¿”å›å€¼
  • ã€ŒthenCombineã€ï¼šä¼šå°†ä¸¤ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡çš„æ‰§è¡Œç»“æœä½œä¸ºæ–¹æ³•å…¥å‚ï¼Œä¼ é€’åˆ°æŒ‡å®šæ–¹æ³•ä¸­ï¼Œä¸”æœ‰è¿”å›å€¼
@Test
public void testCompletableThenCombine() throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException {
    //åˆ›å»ºçº¿ç¨‹æ± 
    ExecutorService executorService = Executors.newFixedThreadPool(10);
    //å¼€å¯å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡1
    CompletableFuture<Integer> task = CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(() -> {
        System.out.println("å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡1ï¼Œå½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹æ˜¯ï¼š" + Thread.currentThread().getId());
        int result = 1 + 1;
        System.out.println("å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡1ç»“æŸ");
        return result;
    }, executorService);

    //å¼€å¯å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡2
    CompletableFuture<Integer> task2 = CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(() -> {
        System.out.println("å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡2ï¼Œå½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹æ˜¯ï¼š" + Thread.currentThread().getId());
        int result = 1 + 1;
        System.out.println("å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡2ç»“æŸ");
        return result;
    }, executorService);

    //ä»»åŠ¡ç»„åˆ
    CompletableFuture<Integer> task3 = task.thenCombineAsync(task2, (f1, f2) -> {
        System.out.println("æ‰§è¡Œä»»åŠ¡3ï¼Œå½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹æ˜¯ï¼š" + Thread.currentThread().getId());
        System.out.println("ä»»åŠ¡1è¿”å›å€¼ï¼š" + f1);
        System.out.println("ä»»åŠ¡2è¿”å›å€¼ï¼š" + f2);
        return f1 + f2;
    }, executorService);

    Integer res = task3.get();
    System.out.println("æœ€ç»ˆç»“æœï¼š" + res);
}

ã€Œè¿è¡Œç»“æœã€

å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡1ï¼Œå½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹æ˜¯ï¼š17
å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡1ç»“æŸ

ä»»åŠ¡2è¿”å›å€¼ï¼š2

2ã€OR ç»„åˆå…³ç³»

åŒºåˆ«åœ¨äºï¼š

  • ã€ŒrunAfterEitherã€ï¼šä¸ä¼šæŠŠæ‰§è¡Œç»“æœå½“åšæ–¹æ³•å…¥å‚ï¼Œä¸”æ²¡æœ‰è¿”å›å€¼
  • ã€ŒacceptEitherã€: ä¼šå°†å·²ç»æ‰§è¡Œå®Œæˆçš„ä»»åŠ¡ï¼Œä½œä¸ºæ–¹æ³•å…¥å‚ï¼Œä¼ é€’åˆ°æŒ‡å®šæ–¹æ³•ä¸­ï¼Œä¸”æ— è¿”å›å€¼
  • ã€ŒapplyToEitherã€ï¼šä¼šå°†å·²ç»æ‰§è¡Œå®Œæˆçš„ä»»åŠ¡ï¼Œä½œä¸ºæ–¹æ³•å…¥å‚ï¼Œä¼ é€’åˆ°æŒ‡å®šæ–¹æ³•ä¸­ï¼Œä¸”æœ‰è¿”å›å€¼

ç¤ºä¾‹

@Test
public void testCompletableEitherAsync() {
    //åˆ›å»ºçº¿ç¨‹æ± 
    ExecutorService executorService = Executors.newFixedThreadPool(10);
    //å¼€å¯å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡1
    CompletableFuture<Integer> task = CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(() -> {
        System.out.println("å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡1ï¼Œå½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹æ˜¯ï¼š" + Thread.currentThread().getId());

        int result = 1 + 1;
        System.out.println("å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡1ç»“æŸ");
        return result;
    }, executorService);

    //å¼€å¯å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡2
    CompletableFuture<Integer> task2 = CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(() -> {
        System.out.println("å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡2ï¼Œå½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹æ˜¯ï¼š" + Thread.currentThread().getId());
        int result = 1 + 2;
        try {
            Thread.sleep(3000);
        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
        System.out.println("å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡2ç»“æŸ");
        return result;
    }, executorService);

    //ä»»åŠ¡ç»„åˆ
    task.acceptEitherAsync(task2, (res) -> {
        System.out.println("æ‰§è¡Œä»»åŠ¡3ï¼Œå½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹æ˜¯ï¼š" + Thread.currentThread().getId());
        System.out.println("ä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡çš„ç»“æœä¸ºï¼š"+res);
    }, executorService);
}

3ã€å¤šä»»åŠ¡ç»„åˆ

allOfï¼šç­‰å¾…æ‰€æœ‰ä»»åŠ¡å®Œæˆ

@Test
public void testCompletableAallOf() throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException {
    //åˆ›å»ºçº¿ç¨‹æ± 
    ExecutorService executorService = Executors.newFixedThreadPool(10);
    //å¼€å¯å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡1
    CompletableFuture<Integer> task = CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(() -> {
        System.out.println("å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡1ï¼Œå½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹æ˜¯ï¼š" + Thread.currentThread().getId());
        int result = 1 + 1;
        System.out.println("å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡1ç»“æŸ");
        return result;
    }, executorService);

    //å¼€å¯å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡2
    CompletableFuture<Integer> task2 = CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(() -> {
        System.out.println("å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡2ï¼Œå½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹æ˜¯ï¼š" + Thread.currentThread().getId());
        int result = 1 + 2;
        try {
            Thread.sleep(3000);
        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
        System.out.println("å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡2ç»“æŸ");
        return result;
    }, executorService);

    //å¼€å¯å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡3
    CompletableFuture<Integer> task3 = CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(() -> {
        System.out.println("å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡3ï¼Œå½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹æ˜¯ï¼š" + Thread.currentThread().getId());
        int result = 1 + 3;
        try {
            Thread.sleep(4000);
        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
        System.out.println("å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡3ç»“æŸ");
        return result;
    }, executorService);

    //ä»»åŠ¡ç»„åˆ
    CompletableFuture<Void> allOf = CompletableFuture.allOf(task, task2, task3);

    //ç­‰å¾…æ‰€æœ‰ä»»åŠ¡å®Œæˆ
    allOf.get();
    //è·å–ä»»åŠ¡çš„è¿”å›ç»“æœ
    System.out.println("taskç»“æœä¸ºï¼š" + task.get());
    System.out.println("task2ç»“æœä¸ºï¼š" + task2.get());
    System.out.println("task3ç»“æœä¸ºï¼š" + task3.get());
}

anyOf: åªè¦æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡å®Œæˆ

@Test
public void testCompletableAnyOf() throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException {
    //åˆ›å»ºçº¿ç¨‹æ± 
    ExecutorService executorService = Executors.newFixedThreadPool(10);
    //å¼€å¯å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡1
    CompletableFuture<Integer> task = CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(() -> {
        int result = 1 + 1;
        return result;
    }, executorService);

    //å¼€å¯å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡2
    CompletableFuture<Integer> task2 = CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(() -> {
        int result = 1 + 2;
        return result;
    }, executorService);

    //å¼€å¯å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡3
    CompletableFuture<Integer> task3 = CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(() -> {
        int result = 1 + 3;
        return result;
    }, executorService);

    //ä»»åŠ¡ç»„åˆ
    CompletableFuture<Object> anyOf = CompletableFuture.anyOf(task, task2, task3);
    //åªè¦æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªæœ‰ä»»åŠ¡å®Œæˆ
    Object o = anyOf.get();
    System.out.println("å®Œæˆçš„ä»»åŠ¡çš„ç»“æœï¼š" + o);
}

CompletableFuture ä½¿ç”¨æœ‰å“ªäº›æ³¨æ„ç‚¹

            throw new RuntimeException("å‡ºé”™äº†");

        return 0.11;
